dotnetType.name: InvalidSymbolException
dotnetType.remarks: See the Avro spec for the full naming rules. (Symbols must conform to the same requirements as names.)
dotnetType.summary: An exception thrown when a symbol does not conform to the Avro naming rules.

overloads.summary: Creates an exception describing an invalid symbol.
The symbol that caused the exception to be thrown.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InvalidSymbolException extends System.Exception
